para: This option controls how the track name header within a Garmin Mobile XT file is processed when reading data.

Valid values for this option are:
0 (Default): Normal processing. GPSBabel will attempt to read the track name from the file header.
1: Ignore. GPSBabel will not read the track name from the file, leaving the track name blank.
This option is useful if the track name information in the file is corrupt or nonsensical, and you would prefer to have a blank track name that you can specify later.

example.title: Ignore the track name when converting a Garmin Mobile XT file
